title: Arumba's Clear Combat mod - Crusader kings v.2.2.02
description:
Arumba's Clear Combat Mod, modified to work for Crusader Kings 2 version 2.2.02


I have always hated the way Crusader Kings 2 handled combat tactics, and I found out about this mod via Youtube.

For a video showing what this mod changes:

For everyone that's been waiting for this to be updated, you're welcome. Tested and works.

(I added 1 point to light infantry morale, so pagan tribal armies don't flee from a single volley of arrows. One less point than heavy infantry. Can be changed in defines.lua)



Install in ..Crusader Kings IImod directory.
Run launcher, add it to active mods.
Play and enjoy



My first torrent upload
